descriptionHtml:
NOTE:You have to download Manually!!!!!

-- Info --
Have you ever wanted to look like Sauron in Skyrim??? Well then this is A mod for you.This mod Adds The Dark Lord Sauron\\\'s Awsome looking armor. Say The Armor is located behind Breezehome in whiterun. The Armor\\\'s graphics fits perfectly fine into the game :) The Armor is strong and Im planing to add his Mace later on. Sauron is the bad guy in \\\"The Lord Of The Rings\\\" Series :)
